description: Another roadside fall.  North of Antigonish, McAdam brook loses all its elevation at once creating a beautiful multi step fall that's only a few meters from the highway.   You probably won't notice it unless you are looking for it.  the terrain to get to it is a bit steep but in a few minutes you will stand at the foot of the fall.
directions: Highway 245 to close to Arisaig.  The fall is approx at;  45°44'27.06"N,  62°11'36.42"W
title: McAdam Brook Fall
